ygData.subject: Re: red peoples
ygData.msgSnippet: ... starting i gave the book to the priest *before i knew how to read it because wheni played the demo i couldn t figure it out either* and am red, and as of
ygData.messageBody:
>Do you all agree with the red pvp stuff? i dont, when i was just
starting i gave the book to the priest *before i knew how to read it
because wheni played the demo i couldn't figure it out either* and am
red, and as of last night i found out another thing that will suck in
the future, and i dont want to start another character because im
already a level 9 necromancer, noone can cure diseases or heal me
unless they are red too... this seems like overkill to me and verant
needs to change some things.

I disagree. This makes perfect sense, to help avoid people
exploiting *pointed stare* the game...

If a blue could heal a red, then all the dewdz and exploiters would
just make a red ogre warrior, and get a friend to make a blue
cleric...The cleric heals the ogre, the ogre bashes a different red,
the other red can't do jack to stop the healer.
